translations.text: When the heaven is split asunder,<sup foot_note="182617">1</sup>
when the seas are made to burst forth,
and when graves are laid open,<sup foot_note="182618">1</sup>
everyone shall know all his deeds, both the earlier and the later.<sup foot_note="182619">1</sup>
O man! What has deceived you about your generous Lord
Who created you, shaped you, and made you well-proportioned,
and set you in whatever form He pleased?<sup foot_note="182620">1</sup>
No indeed;<sup foot_note="182621">1</sup> (the fact is that) you deny the Reckoning,<sup foot_note="182622">2</sup> declaring it a lie;
you do so the while there are watchers over you;
who know what you do.<sup foot_note="182623">1</sup>
Surely the virtuous shall be in Bliss,
and the wicked shall be in the Blazing Fire.
They shall enter it on the Day of Recompense
and then shall never come out of it.
What do you know what the Day of Recompense is?
Again, what do you know what the Day of Recompense is?
It is the Day when no one shall have the power to do anything for another,<sup foot_note="182624">1</sup> and all command shall be Allah's.
